name: Pathogen (itch) (tiffer, owenU22, CalebN)
description:
This is a game where you play as a community of the bacteria botulism trying to kill your host. You go through the body's system making your way to the lungs, heart, and brain. You will encounter lots of enemies on your journey and some challenging bosses of the major organs themselves. (The bosses Heart and Brain are not in the game yet)

Controls: W to move forward, A and D to turn left and right, SHIFT to dash, SPACE to charge attack, release SPACE to fire attack.

Created By:

Christopher Brown (Programming / Art)

Owen Udlock (Level Design / SFX)

Caleb Norton (Graphics / Level Design)

School: Northwest Career & Technical Academy

Class: Video Game Development

Credits:

All audio and tilesets are not made by us.
